column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We were seated at our table and we were offered the most perfect sourdough fluffy cloud bread I have ever eaten. It comes out fresh and warm and I wanted it to be my whole meal
column2: but okay we're at Bavette's so I didn't want to load up. Our waiter was awesome/patient with us because the menu is large and everything looks good
column3: so there was much debate on how we wanted to course things out. We decided on: baked goat cheese (MUST GET!! Seriously
column9: FRITES and garlic aioli. Garlic aioli is one of my biggest weaknesses other than freshly baked Bavette's sourdough bread and puppies.
